title: As Trump went to court, Biden went for a bike ride
description: REHOBOTH BEACH, Del. — Almost as soon as Donald Trump was officially hit with a new federal indictment, Joe Biden was ready to go nuclear.

title: NBC News reports on view from the courtroom for Trump's arraignment
description: NBC News' Garrett Haake reports on what he saw in the courtroom as former President Trump appeared for his arraignment over charges related to efforts to overturn the 2020 election.

title: What to know about the Trump 'fake electors' scheme in the 2020 election
description: At the heart of the latest federal indictment of former President Donald Trump is a scheme to use "fake electors" to overturn the 2020 presidential election.

title: Ex-Trump lawyer Ty Cobb says former president 'is toast'
description: Ty Cobb represented Trump in former special counsel Robert Mueller’s investigation on the Trump campaign and Russian meddling in the 2016 election.

title: Trump's trial has a witness and evidence list like no other
description: The trial for the United States v. Donald J. Trump initially appears to have a witness and evidence list unlike any other in U.S. history, an analysis of the indictment shows.

title: OpenAI's CEO wants to solve AI's verification problem with tech that scans your eyes
description: Worldcoin is part of Sam Altman's vision of a society that is fully hooked on AI. They're asking everyone to get their eyes scanned by a giant orb.

title: Google users can now ask to have their explicit photos removed from search results
description: Google on Thursday rolled out a new policy that allows people to request that their personal, sexually explicit photos be removed from its search results.

title: Pittsburgh synagogue mass shooter sentenced to death by federal judge
description: The man who killed 11 congregants at a Pittsburgh synagogue was formally sentenced to death Thursday, one day after a jury had reached a unanimous decision.

title: Ex-Northwestern football player says teammates shaved racist Cinco de Mayo symbol on his head
description: Ex-football player Ramon Diaz was the latest to sue Northwestern for alleged racism and abuse including having "Cinco de Mayo" shaved on his head by teammates.

title: Another summer surge? What to know about rising Covid hospitalizations.
description: Covid hospitalizations are rising, and wastewater points to a rise in cases. However, overall numbers remain much lower than previously in the pandemic and advice remains the same.

title: Twitch expands its ban on gambling livestreams
description: Amazon-owned Twitch said Wednesday it’s expanding the ban on livestreams of gambling content on the platform.

title: Lizzo says lawsuit allegations are false, calls past few days 'gut wrenchingly difficult'
description: Lizzo broke her silence Thursday morning saying she’s “hurt” as she dismissed the sexual harassment and hostile work environment allegations made by three former dancers in a lawsuit this week as “unbelievable” and “outrageous."

title: Donald Trump arraignment and Oregon kidnapping suspect's violent history: Morning Rundown
description: Trump arraignment, Oregon kidnapping, Navy Biden, Pittsburgh death penalty, Negasi Zuberi, Tanya Chutkan, Somali sprinter, Justin Trudeau divorce, Tom Brady Birmingham

title: LGBTQ teens often struggle to find mental health care tailored to them
description: Mental health care for LGBTQ teens is limited in the U.S. and can be difficult to access, according to a study. Some lawmakers are trying to change that.

title: Trump to appear in federal court to face 2020 election charges
description: The latest news and updates as former President Donald Trump is arraigned on fraud and other charges related to the effort to overturn the 2020 election.

title: Nothing seemed unusual at Oregon home where man is accused of holding woman captive, neighbor says
description: The neighbor of a man accused of kidnapping, sexually assaulting and holding a woman captive in his Oregon garage said Wednesday that nothing seemed out of the ordinary at the home and that the suspect once saved her pet during a near-lethal dog fight.

title: Arizona Republicans wanted to hand-count ballots. Then they saw the price tag — and the errors.
description: An Arizona county has decided not to hand-count ballots next year, discovering that it would cost more than a million dollars and leave it with inaccurate results.
